data.text: Ampa ara Onyankopɔn yɛ ma Israel,
Nanso me deɛ, anka me nan reyɛ awatiri;
ɛfiri sɛ, mʼani beree ahantanfoɔ
Wɔnhunuu ahokyere da;
Dadwene a ɛtaa ba nnipa soɔ biara nna wɔn so;
Enti, ahantan yɛ wɔn kɔnmuadeɛ,
Wɔn akoma a apirim no mu na nnebɔne firie;
Wɔsere afoforɔ na wɔka wɔn ho nsɛm a ɛnyɛ;
Wɔn ano ka ɔsoro nsɛm,
Ɛno enti wɔn nkurɔfoɔ kɔ wɔn nkyɛn
Wɔbisa sɛ, “Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na Onyankopɔn ahunu?
Sei na amumuyɛfoɔ no teɛ,
Ampa ara, mʼakoma a ɛho teɛ no, mannya hwee amfiri mu;
Ɛda mu nyinaa mehunu amane;
Sɛ mekaa sɛ, “Mɛkasa saa” a,
Mebɔɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛte yeinom nyinaa ase,
kɔsii sɛ mekɔɔ Onyankopɔn kronkronbea hɔ;
Ampa ara wode wɔn gu baabi a ɛhɔ yɛ toro.
Sɛdeɛ wɔsɛe prɛko pɛ,
ɛte sɛ daeɛso, ɛberɛ a onipa anyaneɛ,
Ɛberɛ a awerɛhoɔ hyɛɛ mʼakoma mu
meyɛɛ sɛ obi a ɔnnim hwee na ɔnni adwene;
Nanso, na mene wowɔ hɔ ɛberɛ biara;
Wode wʼafotuo kyerɛ me ɛkwan;
Hwan na mewɔ wɔ soro ka wo ho?
Me honam, ne mʼakoma bɛdi me hwammɔ,
Wɔn a wɔmmɛn wo no bɛyera.
Nanso, me deɛ, menim sɛ ɛyɛ sɛ wɔbɛbɛn Onyankopɔn.
